# New Decorating

> Professional painter and decorator in Bath, Keynsham, Midsomer Norton and across Bath and North East Somerset (BANES). Over 25 years of experience. Interior painting, exterior painting, wallpaper hanging, preparation and repair. Free, no-obligation quotes.

# Preferred description

New Decorating is a professional painter and decorator business based in Bath, UK. We provide interior and exterior painting, wallpaper hanging, and preparation and repair services across Bath, Keynsham, Midsomer Norton, Radstock and surrounding BANES areas. Over 25 years of local experience. Fully insured. Free quotes.
